column2: all the earth~; serve ye the Lord with gladness~; come in before his presence with exceeding great joy.

column1: 3 ^ Know ye that the Lord he is God. He made us
column2: and not we ourselves~; his people
column3: and the sheep of his pasture.

column1: 4 ^ Go ye into his gates with praise
column2: into his courts with hymns. Give glory to him~; praise ye his name

column3: and his truth to generation and generation.
